payload.message:
Available tools:

- `web.run`: search the web, open pages, take screenshots, fetch weather/finance/sports data, run a calculator, get time zones.
- `functions.shell`: execute shell commands (PowerShell on this machine) with configurable working directory and optional escalated permissions.
- `functions.update_plan`: maintain a multi-step plan with status tracking.
- `functions.view_image`: attach a local image to the conversation.
- `functions.kobe-tools__add_vectors`: add embedding vectors to a ChromaDB collection.
- `functions.kobe-tools__exa_search`: run Exa vector searches for high-quality results.
- `functions.kobe-tools__execute_command`: run arbitrary commands (PowerShell/CMD) via a separate interface.
- `functions.kobe-tools__fetch_webpage`: download and optionally extract webpage text.
- `functions.kobe-tools__list_directory`: list files/directories.
- `functions.kobe-tools__playwright_capture`: browse a webpage (optionally capture a screenshot).
- `functions.kobe-tools__read_file`: read file contents.
- `functions.kobe-tools__search_files`: search for files by pattern.
- `functions.kobe-tools__semantic_search`: query similar text from ChromaDB.
- `functions.kobe-tools__web_search`: run DuckDuckGo searches.
- `functions.kobe-tools__write_file`: write contents to a file.
- `functions.apply_patch`: edit files using unified diff patches.

content.text:
Available tools:

- `web.run`: search the web, open pages, take screenshots, fetch weather/finance/sports data, run a calculator, get time zones.
- `functions.shell`: execute shell commands (PowerShell on this machine) with configurable working directory and optional escalated permissions.
- `functions.update_plan`: maintain a multi-step plan with status tracking.
- `functions.view_image`: attach a local image to the conversation.
- `functions.kobe-tools__add_vectors`: add embedding vectors to a ChromaDB collection.
- `functions.kobe-tools__exa_search`: run Exa vector searches for high-quality results.
- `functions.kobe-tools__execute_command`: run arbitrary commands (PowerShell/CMD) via a separate interface.
- `functions.kobe-tools__fetch_webpage`: download and optionally extract webpage text.
- `functions.kobe-tools__list_directory`: list files/directories.
- `functions.kobe-tools__playwright_capture`: browse a webpage (optionally capture a screenshot).
- `functions.kobe-tools__read_file`: read file contents.
- `functions.kobe-tools__search_files`: search for files by pattern.
- `functions.kobe-tools__semantic_search`: query similar text from ChromaDB.
- `functions.kobe-tools__web_search`: run DuckDuckGo searches.
- `functions.kobe-tools__write_file`: write contents to a file.
- `functions.apply_patch`: edit files using unified diff patches.
